description: Test that receipts with ambiguous signals (6-digit numbers, $ symbol) do NOT get falsely detected as India

input.text:
Global Professional Services
123 Main Street
Invoice #82216-24-GLPR
Date: August 15, 2024

Services Rendered:
Consulting Services    $47,619.00
Project Management     $50,000.00
Technical Support      $407,381.00

Subtotal:             $505,000.00
Total Due:            $505,000.00

Payment Terms: Net 30
Reference: 123456

Thank you for your business!

reasoning: 6-digit number (123456) alone should NOT trigger India detection
$ symbol is ambiguous (US, CA, AU, SG, etc.)
No India-specific signals present (+91, INR, ₹, GSTIN, Indian states)
Should require ≥2 India signals for detection

geo_country_guess.message: Should NOT detect India based on ambiguous signals alone

geo_confidence.message: Geo confidence should be below UNKNOWN threshold

india_signals_count.message: Should have fewer than 2 India-specific signals
